name: jupyter-cell-notifier
description: Get notifications when Jupyter notebook cells finish running

jupyter-cell-notifier.systemNotification.description: Also show a system notification (macOS Notification Center) when a cell finishes.

jupyter-cell-notifier.slack.enable.description: Send a Slack message (via Incoming Webhook) when a watched cell finishes. Use the command: 'Set Slack Webhook URL' to securely store it.

jupyter-cell-notifier.telegram.enable.description: Send a Telegram message when a watched cell finishes. Use the command: 'Set Telegram Bot Token & Chat ID' to securely store credentials.

jupyter-cell-notifier.includeOutputInMes.description: Include (truncated) cell output in Slack / Telegram messages.

jupyter-cell-notifier.outputCharLimit.description: Maximum characters of cell output to include in external messages.

commands.title: Jupyter Cell Notifier: Set Slack Webhook URL
Jupyter Cell Notifier: Set Telegram Bot Token & Chat ID
